name: Pathfinding Visualizer
description: Interactive visualization of pathfinding algorithms. Draw walls, set start/end points, and watch BFS, DFS, Dijkstra, A*, and Greedy Best-First Search find the shortest path.

name: Double Pendulum
description: Chaos theory simulation demonstrating sensitive dependence on initial conditions. Add multiple pendulums with tiny angle differences and watch them diverge — the butterfly effect in action.

name: Fourier Series Visualizer
description: Draw any shape and watch it reconstructed by rotating circles. Uses the Discrete Fourier Transform to decompose paths into epicycles. Adjustable circle count, speed, and preset shapes.

name: Code Diff Viewer
description: Side-by-side text comparison tool for developers. Highlights additions and deletions between two text inputs with split and unified diff views, line numbers, and statistics.

name: Password Generator
description: Generate secure, cryptographically random passwords. Features adjustable length, character type toggles, entropy calculation, strength indicator, and password history list.

name: Sorting Visualizer
description: Watch sorting algorithms in action. Visualize Bubble Sort, Selection Sort, Insertion Sort, Merge Sort, Quick Sort, and Heap Sort with adjustable speed, live comparison/swap counters, and complexity info.

name: Particle Life
description: Emergent artificial life simulation where particles attract and repel based on type. Watch cells, chains, symbiosis, and hunting behaviors emerge from simple rules.

name: QR Code Generator
description: Generate QR codes for URLs, WiFi networks, and contact cards. Customizable colors, size, and error correction levels. Download as PNG or SVG.

name: JSON Formatter
description: Format, validate, and explore JSON data. Features beautify/minify, syntax highlighting, interactive tree view, validation with error messages, and configurable indentation.

name: Markdown Previewer
description: Live markdown editor with instant preview and syntax highlighting. Features GitHub Flavored Markdown, code blocks with syntax highlighting for 40+ languages, templates, and copy HTML/MD export.

name: Wave Interference
description: Interactive 2D wave physics simulation. Click to add wave sources and watch interference patterns emerge. Features adjustable frequency, wavelength, damping, and preset configurations including the famous double-slit experiment.

name: Color Picker
description: Visual color tool with HSL controls, harmony generation (complementary, analogous, triadic, split-complementary, tetradic), WCAG contrast checker, and one-click copy in HEX/RGB/HSL formats.

name: JWT Decoder
description: Decode and inspect JSON Web Tokens in your browser. View header, payload, and signature with human-readable claim descriptions, expiration detection, and example tokens.

name: Gravity Simulator
description: Interactive N-body gravitational simulation. Click and drag to add celestial bodies, watch orbital mechanics play out. Features 6 preset systems including binary stars, figure-8 orbits, and chaotic 3-body problems.

name: Perlin Noise Terrain
description: Procedural terrain generator using layered Perlin noise (fractal Brownian motion). Adjustable octaves, persistence, lacunarity, scale, and three color modes: terrain colors, grayscale heightmap, and topographic map.

name: Langton's Ant
description: A two-dimensional Turing machine that produces complex emergent behavior from simple rules. Watch chaos turn to order as the ant builds its famous highway pattern.

name: Mandelbrot Explorer
description: Interactive fractal explorer for the Mandelbrot and Julia sets. Click to zoom into infinite complexity, Shift+click to view corresponding Julia sets. Features 6 color palettes and real-time coordinate display.

name: Cron Expression Builder
description: Visual cron expression builder with interactive field selectors, live expression preview, next execution times display, and common presets. Generates human-readable descriptions for any cron schedule.

name: Regex Tester
description: Test and debug regular expressions with live match highlighting. Features flag toggles, capture group display, common pattern examples, and a quick reference cheatsheet.

name: L-System Fractals
description: Generate beautiful botanical and geometric fractals from simple rewriting rules. Features 10 presets including Barnsley Fern, Dragon Curve, and Koch Snowflake with adjustable iterations and angles.

name: Reaction Diffusion
description: Gray-Scott model reaction-diffusion simulator. Watch chemical patterns emerge from simple rules — mitosis, coral, spirals, spots, stripes, and mazes.

name: Conway's Game of Life
description: Interactive cellular automaton simulator with preset patterns like Glider, Pulsar, and Glider Gun. Watch life emerge from simple rules.

name: Wolf Pack Hunting
description: Emergent predator-prey behavior simulation. Watch wolf packs coordinate to hunt prey using realistic flocking and pursuit algorithms.

name: Fursona Generator
description: Random fursona character generator. Get a unique species, colors, personality, accessories, and special features. For when you need a new identity.

name: Life Engine
description: Cellular automaton simulating biological evolution. Organisms eat, reproduce, mutate, and compete through natural selection with multiple cell types.

name: Boids Flocking
description: Classic boids flocking simulation with adjustable separation, alignment, and cohesion parameters. Watch emergent swarm behavior in real-time.
